keeping your siblings out of your pc. They might break stuff.
lightweight music daemon.

nice video player. Totally didn't choose it for the short name.
is a terminal based music player. Doesn't get any better.
is the only program on here your girlfriend has ever heard of.
unicode emojis n all that stuff. Plain text is boring after all.
Without this, you won't see shit though.
NTFS partitions. You don't need that after we're done but bear with me.

cuz pulseaudio is like a child. Leave it alone and it will be a mess of blood and numbers in pure silence.

basically a task manager and some other stuff too sometimes.

is a socket utility.
Anyone said we need more terminals? with this the limit is 512 at once.
hides an inactive mouse and cleans up after you tried opening 512 terminals.
extracts rar's.
unzips zips.
parses URLs in the terminal allowing keyboard-based selection.
terminal browser, can also do images... i think thats the fifth program so far for that. whoops.

provides window action utilities on the command line.
aids with resolution determination and screen recording.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link. May be legal, may be not.
generates image previews in vifm and other terminal programs. I know. More image viewing tools? Really?
PDF editing and previews. Yes, that is actually possible.
Images again? No, this time just sound. And videos. So basically lots of images.
manages and gives information about archives.
is a fuzzy finder tool.
can highlight code output. For those who live on a constant low.
enables changing screen brightness levels.
queues commands or files for download.
enables mounting of cellphones. No guarantee for Iphones, cuz Apple. Some work, some don't.
runs commands and provides a UI for selection.
